Author: Azure Automation Product Team
Summary: This Graphical PowerShell runbook shows how to authenticate to Azure with the Run As account.  It also shows how to manage Azure resources from an Automation runbook - in this case, the runbook gets a list of the names and types of all resources in your Azure subscription.
Title: Azure Automation Tutorial Graphical Runbook
UserTags: GraphicalPS, Automation Tutorial, List Azure Resources
